summary: The Strategies To Eliminate Waste and Accelerate Recycling Development Act of 2025 (STEWARD Act) aims to improve recycling infrastructure and promote data collection on recycling and composting programs. It establishes a pilot grant program to improve recycling accessibility, particularly in underserved communities, and mandates the EPA to collect and disseminate data on recycling and composting infrastructure, materials recovery facilities, and end markets for recyclable and compostable materials. The bill also looks at improving accessibility for recycling programs and waste stream diversion.
